data.text: @OntHospitalAssn Still plenty of uncertainty ahead but the ICU and vented number is now lower than it was at any point in the first six months of 2021. That's something at least...
@OntHospitalAssn Billions of dollars. Zero new hospitals. Absolute criminals. All will be investigated.

@sandi89701936 @OntHospitalAssn A new variant already exists.  It's called BA2, is in 47 of US states.  It spreads faster than Omicron and doesn't respond to antibody treatment. https://t.co/7J3rgmtNd2

@sandi89701936 @OntHospitalAssn Cases in and of themselves do not matter.  ICU & Hospitalizations matter.  We have approx 200 in ICU of which approx 215 are there due to COVID-19.  Numbers are still dropping.  They may or may not rise again but we need to continue to add capacity and train staff to deal with it

@Bonnie42593169 @OntHospitalAssn Your daily loser emoji once again. 
Shame Covid didn't permanently silence you. Rest of us would be better off for it.

@OntHospitalAssn It's too bad that we will now not know the trajectory of new cases since testing/tracing and mitigation measures all fall by the wayside. If there's a new variant on top of Omicron what then? All this for the sake of election/s.
